text: Now, as Alastair reduced the thrust, the pitch changed as the nose of the aircraft dipped slightly. The needle of the speed recorder swung gently through 8.0, 7.0, 6.0 in on minimum engine power.
handwritten_text: Now, as Alastair reduced the thrust, the pitch changed as the nose of the aircraft dipped slightly. The needle of the speed recorder swung gently through 8.0, 7.0, 6.0 in on minimum engine power.
name: Thony Anber
